synopsis.text: Although Jun Shirasaki has been cherished friends with the Jinguuji twins, Ryuumi and Naori, since childhood, his romantic journey takes a complex turn when Ryuumi, the older sister with a boyish appearance but a maiden's heart, unexpectedly ends their relationship. Ryuumi's breakup advice for Jun to pursue her twin sister, Naori, an adorable otaku, only adds to the confusion. As Jun grapples with the loss of his first love, he finds himself entangled in a love triangle with the contrasting twins. Will Jun unravel the mystery behind Ryuumi's sudden change of heart, or will he find new love in the arms of Naori? Join Jun in this heartwarming romantic comedy as he navigates the complexities of first love and friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
